author.name: Bryan Berry - Nathen Harvey - Matt Ray

entry.title: Cookbook Patterns
entry.content:
Join us for our discussion with Jamie Winsor and Tom Duffield as we discuss cookbook patterns.

Watch Now

  • Picks

Panel

  • Jamie Winsor - github, twitter, blog
  • Tom Duffield - github, twitter, blog, irc: tomduffield

Outline

Chef News

  • #ChefConf 2014 - Watch all the videos on YouTube!
  • Awesome Community Chefs
  • ChefDK 0.1.0 Released
  • Upcoming Conferences
    • LOPSA-East - Featuring talks from five Chef employees! Jennifer Davis, Mandi Walls, Michael Goetz, Mark Harrison, and Nathen Harvey
    • DevOps Days Austin - including a talk from Matt Ray
    • devopsdays Pittsburgh - Featuring talks from Kevin Behr, Pete Cheslock, Jennifer Davis, and Nathen Harvey
  • Upcoming Training
    • Chicago - May 6 & 7
    • London - May 13 & 14 - Intermediate Chef
    • San Francisco - May 21 & 22
    • Dallas - May 27 & 28

Show Notes

  • Jamie's blog post on the subject
  • Jamie's #ChefConf 2014 talk: "The Berkshelf Vision"
  • Tom's #ChefConf 2014 talk: "Everything As A Cookbook: Service Oriented Thinking for Your Code"
